drug sales:
Here is the table name <drug_sales> drug sales </drug_sales>

<tableDescription> This table contains sales transaction details of pharmaceutical products across various cities, channels, and sales teams. </tableDescription>

Here are the columns of the Data:

<columns>
- **Distributor**: VARCHAR
- **Customer Name**: VARCHAR
- **City**: VARCHAR
- **Country**: VARCHAR
- **Latitude**: FLOAT
- **Longitude**: FLOAT
- **Channel**: VARCHAR
- **Sub-channel**: VARCHAR
- **Product Name**: VARCHAR
- **Product Class**: VARCHAR
- **Quantity**: INTEGER
- **Price**: FLOAT
- **Sales**: FLOAT
- **Month**: VARCHAR
- **Year**: INTEGER
- **Name of Sales Rep**: VARCHAR
- **Manager**: VARCHAR
- **Sales Team**: VARCHAR
exporting:
Here is the table name <exporting> exporting </exporting>

<tableDescription> This table contains export-related sales data of pharmaceutical products, including pricing, destination, agents, and transaction dates. </tableDescription>

Here are the columns of the Data:

<columns>
- **Order ID**: VARCHAR
- **Generic Name**: VARCHAR
- **Brand Name**: VARCHAR
- **Company Name**: VARCHAR
- **Disease Medical Use**: VARCHAR
- **Invoice date**: DATE
- **Company code**: VARCHAR
- **ship to country**: VARCHAR
- **Sold-to party Country Full Name**: VARCHAR
- **Delivery Plant**: VARCHAR
- **External Agent**: VARCHAR
- **Sales quantity**: INTEGER
- **Price TC /Kg**: FLOAT
- **Revenue**: FLOAT
- **External commissions**: FLOAT
- **Months**: VARCHAR
segmentation:
Here is the table name <segmentation> segmentation </segmentation>

 <tableDescription> This table expresses data segmented based on id, sex, martial status, age, education, income. </tableDescription>

 Here are the columns of the Data:

 <columns> - **ID**: NVARCHAR
- **Sex**: VARCHAR
- **Martial status**: VARCHAR
- **Age**: NVARCHAR
- **Education**: VARCHAR
- **Income**: NVARCHAR
- **Settlement size**: VARCHAR
